title: Designing Personalized Language Education Based on Learning Analytics

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational language proficiency and understanding of basic professional terminology
context.additional_context: Real-time learning data collection and formative assessment integration in smartphone-centric environments.

learning_goals: Learners can identify individual weaknesses three or more times using learning analytics tools when performing discipline-specific language tasks.
Learners can interpret language usage patterns with 80% accuracy by combining peer feedback and learning analytics (LA) data.
Learners can apply normative analysis results at least twice to improve project outcomes.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
